articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Reply Message from Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Reply Message from Syrian President
Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a reply message from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on Thursday.
					 The president in the message expressed thanks to Kim Jong Un for his kind congratulations on the 55th anniversary of the March 8 revolution in Syria.
					
					 He appraised Kim Jong Un's support for the Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party and the army of Syria and our righteous cause for the restoration of the country's stability.
					
					 The message wished him good health and happiness and the friendly Korean people greater progress.

articles.title: 12th Winter Paralympics Opens
articles.content:
12th Winter Paralympics Opens
Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The 12th Winter Paralympics opened in Phyongchang of south Korea on Friday.
					 Players and agents of different countries and regions including the DPRK entered the venue of the opening ceremony.
					
					 Congratulatory speeches were made there.
					
					 The opening was declared and the flag of the Winter Paralympics hoisted.
					
					 There took place a ceremony of lighting the cauldron of the Winter Paralympics.
					
					 The 12th Winter Paralympics will close on March 18.

articles.title: Conservation of Migratory Bird Reserves Gains Momentum
articles.content:
Conservation of Migratory Bird Reserves Gains Momentum
Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- It is getting brisk underway in the DPRK to conserve the sanctuaries of sea-birds and migratory birds and winter birds' habitats.
					 Sanctuaries and habitats along the coastal areas and inlands of the DPRK are very important for migration and inhabitant of birds in Northeast Asia.
					
					 Scientists of the Biodiversity Institute under the State Academy of Sciences are surveying the number of migratory birds, their inhabitation and ranges in those areas.
					
					 Due measures have been taken to provide migratory birds with inhabitable conditions, such as banning human activities in those areas, preventing fire from natural causes and watering dried lands.
					
					 Pisan-ri, Anbyon County of Kangwon Province is making achievements in restoring the habitat of crane by introducing agro-forestry management technology and organic farming method in good combination with its management.
					
					 There are more than 30 winter habitats and sanctuaries for migratory birds in the DPRK.

articles.title: Riganggo, High-quality Liquor
articles.content:
Riganggo, High-quality Liquor
Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The method of brewing Riganggo, one of famous liquors of Korea, was listed as a national intangible heritage of the DPRK in recent years.
					 Riganggo is brewed from a mixture of distilled spirits and ginger and celebrated pear produced in Hwanghae province.
					
					 History books like "Tongguksesigi" and "Kyongdojapji" say that Riganggo is one of famous liquors of Korea together with Kamhong-ro (high-quality spirit) of Pyongyang.
					
					 Rigango is yellowish lucid liquor with fresh and attractive flavor of pear and ginger and has enjoyed popularity in Hwanghae province from olden times.
					
					 Now, the method of brewing Riganggo is being further developed thanks to the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea on protecting the nation's cultural heritage.

articles.title: U.S. Military Force, Sanctions and Blockade Will Not Work on DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Military Force, Sanctions and Blockade Will Not Work on DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The U.S. recently declared that it would impose sanctions on 56 designations -- 27 shipping and trading companies, 28 vessels and one individual of the DPRK and other countries -- under the pretext of preventing the DPRK from "attempting at evasion of sanctions" and of stopping illegal means that can help the transactions with the DPRK in the open sea.
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Saturday denounces the U.S. for staging the farce, not content with cooking up illegal "sanctions resolutions" to stamp out the DPRK's sovereignty and rights to existence and development by abusing the UN Security Council.
					
					 This is an open violation of international laws and an encroachment upon the sovereignty of the DPRK, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 By nature, the U.S., out of inveterate repugnancy against the DPRK, goes ill-natured whenever it sees things going well in the DPRK.
					
					 But the U.S. could not stop the DPRK from making a dash toward the final victory in building a powerful socialist nation.
					
					 What matters is that the U.S. sanctions and blockade are very dangerous acts that may bring a war.
					
					 The U.S. tries to isolate and stifle the DPRK through sanctions and blockade and weaken it in a bid to bring it under control with ease.
					
					 It is now making desperate efforts to stifle the DPRK while getting keen on the racket for sanctions and military pressure on the DPRK. But the army and the people of the DPRK will never be browbeaten.
					
					 Neither military force nor sanctions and blockade can ever work on the DPRK, stresses the commentary.

articles.title: Japan Can Never Get Rid of Ill-fame as War Criminal State: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japan Can Never Get Rid of Ill-fame as War Criminal State: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- A video showing the massacre committed by the Imperial Japanese Army against sexual slaves in 1944 was recently disclosed. The 19-second footage was taken in Yunnan Province of China. Together with the video, 14 documents and 2 photos were disclosed which proved that the Imperial Japanese Army shot to death 30 Korean women.
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Saturday says that this has brought to light once again the barbarity and cruelty of the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Japan's right-wing conservative forces including the Abe group are making a far-fetched assertion that there has never been such a thing as the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and insulted the victims of the sexual slavery as "prostitutes" and tried to shift the blame on to the victims, claiming that "they provided sex out of their own accords for money".
					
					 But the recent video clearly proves that there actually existed the sexual slavery system for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 The aim sought by Japan in persisting in its moves to cover up the crime related to the sexual slavery is not just to evade shame as a war criminal state. Those who deny crimes are bound to repeat them any time in the future. The aim sought by the Abe group is to deny the history of crimes, bring back the past history of aggression and crimes and thus realize the ambition for putting Asia under its control which Japan failed to do in the past.
					
					 Japan is trying to imbue the new generations with the militarist idea and nurture the spirit of avenge among the Japanese. It is making desperate efforts to cover up the hideous crimes against humanity and paint Japan as a "normal state".
					
					 But Japan is gravely mistaken. With neither sleight of hand nor a few penny of money can Japan get rid of the ill-fame as a war criminal state.

articles.title: Works of Peerlessly Great Men Introduced in Brazil
articles.content:
Works of Peerlessly Great Men Introduced in Brazil
Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Center for the Study of Songun Politics on February 18 and 19 posted on its website President Kim Il Sung's works "For the Establishment of a United Party of the Working Masses", "Let Us Overthrow Imperialism" and "Let Us Intensify the Anti-Imperialist, Anti-U.S. Struggle", leader Kim Jong Il's works "On Having a Correct Understanding of Nationalism", "On the Juche Idea", "Socialism Is a Science" and "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Foreign Papers
Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- To mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, newspapers of different countries featured articles: "Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Feats for Korean Revolution", "People's Leader Kim Jong Il", etc.
					 Those papers carried a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and his photos.
					
					 The Lao paper Vientiane Mai said that the reality of the DPRK pushing ahead with the building of a powerful socialist country despite ordeals of every description is inseparable from the feats of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Iranian paper The Iran News said that he devoted himself to the people, regarding them as the most precious being in the world and a teacher, adding that his benevolent image as the genuine leader of the people would be always remembered by the Korean people and the world progressives.
					
					 The Myanmar paper The New Age referred to the feats of the peerlessly great man who developed comprehensively and in depth the Juche idea through his rare ideological and theoretical activities to clearly show the road ahead of the progressive people, praising him as the great sage of mankind.
					
					 The Zambian paper Brandline News, the DR Congo paper La Prosperite and the Belarusian paper Buperyod, too, carried articles praising his ideo-theoretical feats and Songun leadership feats.
					
					 The Angolan paper O Pais told about his feats for national reunification; the Congolese paper La Patriot about the noble traits of Kim Jong Il who took care of all people with warm human love; and the Nigerian paper Nigerian Observer about how the immortal flower Kimjongilia came into being.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated Abroad
Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Meetings, lectures, round-table talks and book and photo exhibitions took place in India, Mexico and Zambia to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, the Day of the Shining Star.
					 On show at the venues of the exhibitions were photos dealing with feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also there were works of the peerlessly great men and books and photos introducing the reality of Juche Korea making rapid progress day by day.
					
					 The secretary general of the Indian Youth Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung said Kim Jong Il is the leader of the people who had done all the work, absolutely trusting and relying on them and that his noble image as the genuine leader of the people would be always kept in the minds of the Korean people and the world progressives.
					
					 The national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico and the president of the Mexican Friend Association for Memory of President Kim Il Sung and Leader Kim Jong Il praised the Songun leadership feats of Kim Jong Il and mentioned the praiseworthy successes made by the army and people of the DPRK under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta del presidente sirio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta del presidente sirio
Pyongyang, 10 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Un, recibio un mensaje de respuesta que le extendiera el dia 8 el Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Su Excelencia Presidente
					
					Le agradezco por haberme enviado la amable congratulacion en ocasion del 55o aniversario de la Revolucion del 8 de Marzo en Siria.
					
					Igualmente, aprecio la posicion de apoyo que manifiesta Vd. al Partido Socialista del Resurgimiento Arabe (BAAS), nuestro ejercito y nuestras justas causas, inclusive la recuperacion de la estabilidad del pais.
					
					Aprovechando esta ocasion, le reitero mi gratitud y formulo votos por la salud y felicidad de Vd. y por el mayor progreso del amistoso pueblo coreano.

articles.title: Inaugurados los XII Juegos Paralimpicos Invernales
articles.content:
Inaugurados los XII Juegos Paralimpicos Invernales
Pyongyang, 10 de marzo (ACNC) -- Quedaron inaugurados el dia 9 en Phyongchang del Sur de Corea los XII Juegos Paralimpicos Invernales.
					Entraron en la sede de ceremonia inaugural los jugadores y el personal de asistencia de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y otros paises y regiones. 
					
					En la ceremonia hubo discursos de felicitacion.
					
					Despues de anunciada la apertura, se izo la bandera que simboliza los Juegos Paralimpicos y se efectuo la ceremonia de encendida del pebetero.
					
					La cita deportiva terminara el dia 18.

articles.title: Ninguna medida coercitiva de EE.UU. podra doblegar a la RPDC, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Ninguna medida coercitiva de EE.UU. podra doblegar a la RPDC, apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 10 de marzo (ACNC) -- Hace poco, EE.UU. anuncio que impondria la sancion contra 56 blancos, o sea, 27 companias de transporte maritimo y de comercio exterior, 28 barcos y un individuo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y del tercer pais bajo el pretexto de impedir la "evasiva de sancion" de este pais socialista y controlar los medios ilegales que ayudan las transacciones en alta mar.
					Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun publico el dia 10 un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					Anteriormente, EE.UU. fabrico abusando del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU las ilegales "resoluciones de sancion" encaminadas a acabar con la soberania y los derechos a subsistencia y desarrollo de la RPDC.
					
					Tal conducta constituye violacion flagrante del derecho internacional y atentado contra la soberania de la RPDC.
					
					Con el veto cronico a la RPDC, EE.UU. se portaba mal cada vez que la primera hacia algo o le iba bien.
					
					Pero, no pudo detener nuestro avance de viento en popa hacia la victoria final de la construccion de potencia socialista.
					
					Lo problematico es que la campana de sancion y bloqueo de EE.UU. es un acto muy peligroso que implica la guerra.
					
					EE.UU. pretende ocupar facilmente a la RPDC despues de aislarla, asfixiarla y neutralizarla mediante la sancion y el bloqueo.
					
					Nuestros militares y habitantes no se asustan ni un comino ante los desesperados movimientos del imperio americano para atropellar a la RPDC.
					
					Ninguna fuerza militar ni la sancion ni el bloqueo saldra con la suya en el trato con la RPDC.

articles.title: Japon se quedara siempre pais criminal de guerra, afirma Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japon se quedara siempre pais criminal de guerra, afirma Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 10 de marzo (ACNC) -- Hace poco, se dio a la publicidad un video de 19 segundos, filmado en la provincia de Yunnan de China sobre el asesinato de las esclavas sexuales cometido en 1944 por las tropas japonesas. Ademas, se publicaron 14 documentos y 2 fotos y en los primeros hay el registro de fusilamiento de 30 mujeres coreanas.
					Asi se conocieron claramente en todo el mundo la crueldad y atrocidad de los imperialistas japoneses.
					
					Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun divulgo este sabado un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					Actualmente, los compinches de Abe y otras fuerzas conservadoras derechistas de Japon niegan la misma existencia de las esclavas sexuales para el viejo ejercito japones diciendo que ellas eran "prostitutas que comercializaban el sexo voluntariamente".
					
					Sin embargo, el nuevo video comprueba de modo irrefutable la existencia de esa esclavitud sexual.
					
					Al negar obstinadamente la historia de crimenes y agresiones e intentar su repeticion, la camarilla de Abe no persigue solamente liberarse de la verguenza de pais criminal de guerra sino realizar a toda costa su ambicion de dominar a Asia.
					
					Por eso, Japon inyecta en las nuevas generaciones la idea militarista y en sus habitantes, el revanchismo.
					
					Trata de hacerse "Estado normal" dejando en el olvido sus tremendos crimenes antieticos.
					
					Japon esta equivocado porque no podra liberarse de las trabas impuestas al pais criminal de guerra con artimana barata o sumas miserables de dinero.
